Files & Folders

what are folders, Continued

Home

When you double-click on a folder, you open it, and you will be able to see all the files in it. When someone asks you to open a folder, that is what they mean, double-click it to see what's inside. Folders can also contain other folders, a folder within a folder is known as a subfolder.

When you open a folder, what you will see will be something like the image below.
